pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python Tools for Applications of Interval Design## RequirementsPython 3.11+## Installation```shpip install interval-tools```Or if you want to use[ObjectID](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/bson-types/#objectid)as a unique identifier for `Entity` or `Aggregate`, run```shpip install "interval-tools[objectid]"```## Quickstart```pycon>>> from interval.utils import batched>>> for batch in batched('ABCDEFG', 3):... print(batch)...('A', 'B', 'C')('D', 'E', 'F')('G',)```
